[00:00.00]Violent Crimes (Explicit) - Kanye West
[00:00.17]Written by：Kanye West
[00:00.35]Fallin' dreamin' talkin' in your sleep
[00:07.25]I know you want to cry all night
[00:10.00]
[00:12.70]All night
[00:14.26]
[00:17.58]Plottin' schemin' finding
[00:22.27]
[00:23.99]Reason to defend all of your violent nights
[00:27.74]
[00:30.12]Promise me
[00:31.76]
[00:39.51]Don't you grow up in a hurry
[00:40.75]
[00:41.98]Your mom'll be worried
[00:42.79]
[00:43.94]It was all part of the story
[00:45.19]
[00:46.45]Even the scary nights
[00:48.05]Thank you for all of the glory
[00:49.45]
[00:50.55]You will be remembered aw
[00:52.54]Thank you to all of the heroes of the night
[00:55.26]Night night
[00:56.78]They gotta repeat the colors
[00:58.15]
